# Ignore system files  
.DS_Store  
Thumbs.db  

# Ignore log, cache, and temporary files  
*.log  
*.tmp  
*.cache  

# Ignore local configuration and environment files (security reasons)  
.env  
.env.local  
config.yaml  

# Ignore compiled binaries and auto-generated files  
*.exe  
*.dll  
*.out  
*.pyc  

# Ignore IDE and editor-specific files  
.vscode/  
.idea/  
*.swp  

# Ignore dependency folders (if frameworks are used later)  
node_modules/  
dist/  
build/  

# Ignore Git-related files (not necessary but kept for clarity)  
.gitignore  

# Ignore project-specific output files  
coverage/  
debug.log  
npm-debug.log
